summary: This is a Fix for mission The Wolf Queen Awakened, cause CTD when Potema spawn if you have replacer clothes/textures mod - Fix Potema CTD for REAL 100% guaranteed
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#ff00ff][size=5][b]POTEMA REAL FIX[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[color=#ff00ff][b]Description[/b][/color]:

This mod Fix CTD for mission The Wolf Queen Awakened when Potema spawn.
Real Fix for Potema [b]NO CTD[/b] [b]100% guaranteed[/b], i have try some other fix but dont works for me and for other... I have decided to make by me a fix and this works with ALL armor/clothes/textures replacer, you dont need rename or remove anything (not needed rename/delete/reactivate any yarl meshes or textures...). Potema use a yarl clothes 03 and when she spawn if you have replacer mod probably you have a CTD, this mod fix that!

[color=#ff00ff][b]Intallation[/b][/color]:

Before the quest, simply activate the mod and place LAST in your load order! If you want can remove after finished full quest-line of Potema! No script no broken save!

Enjoy!

[color=#ff00ff][b]My Mod[/b][/color]:
If you want variety and beatiful enemy try my other mod:
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59321/][color=#ff00ff][b]F.E.M.A.L.E.[/b][/color][/url][/size]
author: Fiuzo
